title: US Starter Pack
description: Great choice for any adrenaline-pumped soldier who prefers guerrilla warfare over a game of patience - machine gun fire, knife fights, and explosions; what more can you ask for?
longDescription:
# US Starter Pack
Great choice for any adrenaline-pumped soldier who prefers guerrilla warfare over a game of patience - machine gun fire, knife fights, and explosions; what more can you ask for?

# Contents
- Thompson M1A1
- Akicita Kinetic Ammunition
- Mk II Handgrenade
- Combat Knife 1219C2
- 1 x Explosives Ribbon Booster
- 1 x Close Combat Ribbon Booster
- 1 x SMG Assault Ribbon Booster
- 1 x Thompson M1A1 Specialist Ribbon Booster

# Thompson M1A1
The Thompson M1A1 (or Tommy gun as it is sometimes known) is a fully-automatic submachine gun used by the US Armed Forces. It fires a powerful .45 caliber round and is a very effective weapon at close to medium ranges.

# Akicita Kinetic
The tip of this projectile is made of lead to allow it to expand upon contact with soft tissue. This reduces the roundâ€™s accuracy.

# Mk II
The Mk 2 hand grenade (also known as the pineapple grenade) is a fragmentation hand grenade issued to US armed forces. It can be thrown around 30-35 yards by an experienced soldier.

# Combat Knife 1219C2
The American Soldier's trusty sidekick. Good for cutting things open and poking holes in enemies. Silent and deadly, but you need to get really close to using it.

# Ribbon Boosters
Ribbon Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.
